metadata.title: CVE-2023-1264 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1392.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1264` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
vim-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
xxd - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.4').
